Welcome to

Sai Ganapathi Polytechnic

Welcome to Sai Ganapathi Polytechnic College. Established in the year 2006 by Sri Sai Ganesh Educational & CharitableTrust, Bollili - Sai Ganapathi Polytechnic offers aspiring engineers high quality technical education. It is the first private polytechnic in Visakhapatnam District and second one in the North-Costal Districts. It has the intakes of 840 seats in the all branches and Which is highest intake in the North-Coastal Districts
